value:
Tactical Retreat:
Thrice per chain of wins, you can
return to the previous screen
without losing your score or your
chain. If you reset your chain,
however, your tactical retreats
will become available again.

Recruitable Heroes:
You can only recruit Heroes that
were released between Ver. 1.0
and Ver. 6.11.

You cannot recruit Heroes you
dispatch, or the Alfonse, Sharena,
Anna, or Ash you begin with.

About Shaping Your Forma:
・ At Chamber 13 and chambers
beyond, two skills above a set SP
threshold will be shown per slot.
・ At Chamber 25, three skills
above a particularly high SP
threshold will be displayed.

More Information:
Heroes moved into the reserves
will have their seals, accessories,
Pair Ups, Summoner Supports,
and engages removed.
Earn a reward each day during\nYour Time to Shine.
Clear a map to earn a reward each\nday for up to five days.
You cannot change your team during\nthe event unless you start over by\nselecting Restart.

Every slot on your team must be
filled by a Hero.

Duplicate Heroes are not allowed.

You can include only one ally
that can use Sing or Dance
on your team.

You can include only one ally that
can use Savior.
Version Bonus Heroes have\nreceived positive status effects.
All non-reward progress will be lost.\nConsumed Hero Stamina will\nbe restored.
Your favorite Heroes fight with\npositive status effects!

Your Time to Shine:
Dispatch your favorite Heroes.

Heroes stack positive status
effects to make them stronger.

Dispatching:
・ 1 Hero Stamina is consumed
when you dispatch Heroes.

・ Hero Stamina is restored to full
when you lose in the Stratum with
the final boss. (It is not restored if
your Hero Stamina is already full.)

Event Details:
Starting each turn, every Hero is
bestowed with all status effects
obtained from clearing maps
and receiving bonuses.

Forming your Team:
・ Duplicate Heroes are not
allowed.
・ You can include only one ally
that can use Sing or Dance.
・ You can include only one ally
that can use Savior.

Version Bonus Heroes:
Heroes from versions of the game
that fall into the Version Bonus
can receive three positive status
effects at the start of the event.

(Status effects are random and
decided automatically.)

Chance for Bonuses:
After clearing maps, you can grant
status effects to Heroes by
choosing from the options shown.

Gain Strength with Bonuses:
Upon dispatching on each map,
Heroes' HP, Atk, Spd, Def, and
Res each increase by 2 times the
number of status effects obtained
up until that point.
(Version Bonus Heroes: max 26;
other Heroes: max 20)

More Information:
・ Legendary and Mythic Hero
seasonal effects are deactivated.
・ Neither Duo Skills nor
Harmonized Skills can be used.
・ You do not get EXP or SP.
・ You can obtain Hero Merit.
